title: Sketchbook Folio, "Waves Crashing on Rocks with Sun Overhead", 1885–90
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Waves crashing on rocks at right. In sky at center, the sun bursting through the clouds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Waves Crashing on Rocks with Sun Overhead", 1885–90.
1885–90. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-84-56.
